snippet.title: Block Buster VR - Exclusive Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
In Block Buster, you're kind of a BIG deal. See what being a Kaiju is all about in this new gameplay trailer of Block Buster VR. 
 
Don a homemade monster suit and tear apart cities!
Eat and smash puny humans!
Crush cars and burn them all with fire!
Nerd out with the ultimate monster movie fan collection!
 
Block Buster is a larger-than-life action-arcade game that's all about creative demolition. More destruction equals greater rewards. Acquire KARNAGE POINTS and use them to craft and customize the monster (and monster-themed bedroom) of your dreams. 
Coming to Meta Quest 2 (formerly known as the Oculus Quest 2) in 2023

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
